author: andschwa
body: This sample should exist outside of the current Makefile, and really simulate that it was used from a PowerShell build, similar to how a 3rd party company would use powershell  see the hashbang sample for details  We can still deploy this with PowerShell, it just needs to compile and work outside of the regular build, not re using any of the regular build's variables  we could still reuse the coreclr.mk though .  VSO create date - 6/18/2015 13:21:00

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Ha, this can be closed. Stick the module in the `PsModulePath`. If you need to reference libraries directly, we'll have NuGet packages.

title: Add sample for building a 3rd party .net module against the linux build of PowerShell
